title: Eränkävijät: Äijän retket
overview: Wilderness Explorers: Äijä's Trips returns with new adventures! In the series, well-known Finns and their dogs experience unforgettable adventures with Wilderness Explorers' Aki Huhtanen and Äijä's dog. The guests face the challenges of the wilderness in Käsivarre Lapland and get to test their skills. In the second season, Aki and Äijä will be visited by Jukka Hildén, Pippa Laukka, Emma Kimiläinen, Sari Helin, Shirly Karvinen and Tommi Manninen.
